Class Client

java.lang.Object
app.networking.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class Client extends Object implements Closeable
Provides the networking API for connecting and working with the Server

      public void start(String ip, int port)
      Start the client. Connects to the server at the given ip and port.
      Parameters:
      ip - server ip
      port - server port

    • signUp

      public void signUp(String username, String password, Consumer<org.json.JSONObject> callback)
      Registers a new user and automatically sets callback
      Parameters:
      username - user's username
      password - user's password
      callback - function to be called after the server's response

    • addSignUpOnResponseCallback

      public void addSignUpOnResponseCallback(Consumer<org.json.JSONObject> callback)
      Sets a callback function which will be called after the server's response on a SIGN_UP request. The callback must expect a JSONObject object containing the server's response. The response has an attribute "result" which will return either "SUCCESS" or "ERROR".

      Attributes in case of:

      • "SUCCESS":
        • null
      • "ERROR":
        • String message - error message
      Parameters:
      callback - a lambda expression of the callback

    • login

      public void login(String username, String password)
      Logs in a new user
      Parameters:
      username - user's username
      password - user's password

      public void login(String username, String password, Consumer<org.json.JSONObject> callback)

      username - user's username
      password - user's password
      callback - function to be called after the server's response

    • addLoginOnResponseCallback

      public void addLoginOnResponseCallback(Consumer<org.json.JSONObject> callback)
      Sets a callback function which will be called after the server's response on a LOGIN request. The callback must expect a JSONObject object containing the server's response. The response has an attribute "result" which will return either "SUCCESS" or "ERROR".

      Attributes in case of:

      • "SUCCESS":
        • null
      • "ERROR":
        • String message - error message
      Parameters:
      callback - a lambda expression of the callback

    • addCreateChatOnResponseCallback

      public void addCreateChatOnResponseCallback(Consumer<org.json.JSONObject> callback)
      Sets a callback function which will be called after the server's response on a CREATE_CHAT request. The callback must expect a JSONObject object containing the server's response. The response has an attribute "result" which will return either "SUCCESS" or "ERROR".

      Attributes in case of:

      • "SUCCESS":
        • int chat_id
      • "ERROR":
        • String message - error message
      Parameters:
      callback - a lambda expression of the callback

      callback - a lambda expression of the callback

      timeStamp - time that the message was sent

    • getChats

      public void getChats()

    • getChats

      public void getChats(Consumer<org.json.JSONObject> callback)
      Requests all the chats that the user is in and automatically sets callback
      Parameters:
      callback - function to be called after the servers response

    • addGetChatsOnResponseCallback

      public void addGetChatsOnResponseCallback(Consumer<org.json.JSONObject> callback)
      Sets a callback function which will be called after the server's response on a GET_CHATS request. The callback must expect a JSONObject object containing the server's response. The response has an attribute "result" which will return either "SUCCESS" or "ERROR".

      Attributes in case of:

      • "SUCCESS":
        • JSONArray chats - integer array of ID's of all the accessible to user chats
      • "ERROR":
        • String message - error message
      Parameters:
      callback - callback

    • getMessages

      public void getMessages(int chatID)
      Requests all the messages in a given chat
      Parameters:
      chatID - id of the chat

    • getMessages

      public void getMessages(int chatID, Consumer<org.json.JSONObject> callback)
      Requests all the messages in a given chat and automatically sets the callback
      Parameters:
      chatID - id of the chat where messages are being retrieved
      callback - function to be called after the servers response

    • addGetMessagesOnResponseCallback

      public void addGetMessagesOnResponseCallback(Consumer<org.json.JSONObject> callback)
      Sets a callback function which will be called after the server's response on a GET_MESSAGES request. The callback must expect a JSONObject object containing the server's response. The response has an attribute "result" which will return either "SUCCESS" or "ERROR".

      Attributes in case of:

      • "SUCCESS":
        • JSONArray messages - JSONObject array of messages:
          • String time_stamp
          • String sender
          • String content
          • int chat_id
      • "ERROR":
        • String message - error message
      Parameters:
      callback - callback

    • setReceiveMessageCallback

      public void setReceiveMessageCallback(Consumer<org.json.JSONObject> callback)
      Sets a callback function which will be called after when somebody sends the user a message The callback must expect a JSONObject object containing the server's response. Attributes: String time_stamp String sender String content int chat_id

      Attributes:

      • String time_stamp
      • String sender
      • String content
      • int chat_id
      Parameters:
      callback - callback

      Requests messages queued while the user is inactive
